attributes.action: Remove Theresa may from power immediately
attributes.additional_details: When the past prime minister resigned she was not voted into power she is not the people's voice and she is causing harm to our country by making decisions on her own feelings other than that of the people she should stand down as she has now become a spectacle for the world as our government has become a circus of poor judgment
attributes.background: The fact that she was not voted into power and she openly refuses to listen to anyone apart from what she classes as her government when in fact it is the people's and showd great disregard on the misile trident fail when she avoided the questions and the safety of the United Kingdom
